biography: Tim Hiser was born on September 23, 1955 in Lubbock, Texas, USA. He is known for his work on Indiana Jones et la dernière croisade (1989), Always - Pour toujours (1989) and R5Sons Alaska (2009). He has been married to Kathy Hiser since May 16, 1980. They have two children.
name: Tim Hiser

cast.title: 夺宝奇兵3：圣战奇兵
cast.original_title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
